name: Vortex Vanquisher
desc: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.
skill_desc: Increases Shield Strength by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.
